oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A. Schwab's with People
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “A. Schwab Beale St. Museum” Black-and-white image of A. Schwab with sign “Better Goods at Lowest Prices” with Morris Pinstein Shoes visible in the background, several people walking on street.

“A. Schwab -- Established 1876 -- 163 Beale St. Memphis -- 1939 -- A. Schwab – the oldest business on Beale St. The store provides a nostalgic trip for the visitor into one of the last remaining working general stores in the South.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: A. Schwab; Beale Street; museums; stores; general stores; Beale Street businesses;
